import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { hideModal } from '../../Redux/Slices/CustomFunctions' export default function ModalBasket() { const view = useSelector(state => state.funcSlice.modalActive) const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(view); return
dispatch(hideModal())}>
